name: Strive (itch) (artydagr8)
description: Strive is a short 3 level game I created to as part of a school 'Game-Jam' for a few days. It's based off the theme "Fall-apart". For more info regarding the game and Design intents and Design Documenation, please click the folling link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx6_7xzdmMWXXzd2VUkwSW1qY00/view?usp=sharing
